title: App is crashing when sending a transaction request in chat

labels.name: priority 1: high
labels.description: an issue that is extremely important to fix, that interferes with the majority of users, occurs ofte

body:
### Description

```
"There are still \"-1\" items in the process of being created at engine destruction."
/Users/jenkins/workspace/us-desktop_branches_macos_master/src/nim_status_client.nim(168) nim_status_client
/Users/jenkins/workspace/us-desktop_branches_macos_master/src/nim_status_client.nim(165) mainProc
/Users/jenkins/workspace/us-desktop_branches_macos_master/vendor/nimqml/src/nimqml/private/qguiapplication.nim(29) exec
/Users/jenkins/workspace/us-desktop_branches_macos_master/vendor/nimqml/src/nimqml/private/qobject.nim(49) qobjectCallback

/Users/jenkins/workspace/us-desktop_branches_macos_master/src/app/core/signals/signals_manager.nim(56) receiveSignal
/Users/jenkins/workspace/us-desktop_branches_macos_master/src/app/core/signals/signals_manager.nim(53) processSignal
/Users/jenkins/workspace/us-desktop_branches_macos_master/src/app/core/eventemitter.nim(46) emit
/Users/jenkins/workspace/us-desktop_branches_macos_master/src/app_service/service/message/service.nim(262) :anonymous
/Users/jenkins/workspace/us-desktop_branches_macos_master/src/app_service/service/message/service.nim(188) handleMessagesUpdate
/Users/jenkins/workspace/us-desktop_branches_macos_master/src/app/core/eventemitter.nim(46) emit
/Users/jenkins/workspace/us-desktop_branches_macos_master/src/app/modules/main/chat_section/chat_content/messages/controller.nim(66) :anonymous
/Users/jenkins/workspace/us-desktop_branches_macos_master/src/app/modules/main/chat_section/chat_content/messages/io_interface.nim(44) messageAdded
/Users/jenkins/workspace/us-desktop_branches_macos_master/src/app/modules/main/chat_section/chat_content/messages/module.nim(256) messageAdded
/Users/jenkins/workspace/us-desktop_branches_macos_master/src/app/modules/main/chat_section/chat_content/messages/controller.nim(264) getTransactionDetails

/Users/jenkins/workspace/us-desktop_branches_macos_master/vendor/nim-web3/web3/ethtypes.nim(231) parseAddress
/Users/jenkins/workspace/us-desktop_branches_macos_master/vendor/nim-task-runner/vendor/nim-stew/stew/byteutils.nim(69) fromHex
/Users/jenkins/workspace/us-desktop_branches_macos_master/vendor/nim-task-runner/vendor/nim-stew/stew/byteutils.nim(59) hexToByteArray

Error: unhandled exception: hex string too short [ValueError]
```

To reproduce, u need to request an address from a contact in 1x1 chat
